name: Issue Triage
description: Fetches untriaged GitHub issues, classifies them (bug/feature/question), detects duplicates, and generates a triage report. Read-only -- does not modify issues directly.
process: Fetch all open issues without a triage label using github_fetch (GET /repos/tinyland-inc/remote-juggler/issues?labels=&state=open)
For each untriaged issue, analyze title and body to classify as: bug, feature, question, or campaign-finding
Check for duplicate issues by comparing titles and fingerprints against existing labeled issues
Generate a structured triage report with classification counts and duplicate candidates
Return JSON with KPIs: issues_triaged, bugs_found, features_found, questions_found, duplicates_found

metrics.successCriteria: All open issues classified with zero misses
